| 5 |  | #P_f1ocnvfv | |- ( ( G : _om -1-1-onto-> NN0 /\ ( card ` A ) e. _om ) -> ( ( G ` ( card ` A ) ) = ( # ` A ) -> ( `' G ` ( # ` A ) ) = ( card ` A ) ) ) |
